boardgame.name: Ascension: Des Âmes Déchaînées
Ascension: Storm of Souls
Ascension: Sturm der Seelen
アセンション～魂の嵐～
boardgame.description: Samael is dead, but a storm is still raging across Vigil. Ascension: Storm of Souls takes players into the chaos following the Fallen One's demise. As Samael's monsters run wild and his minions conspire, the world is being slowly overtaken with souls that should have moved on. Are you ready for the new challenges that Vigil's future holds?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ascension: Storm of Souls is the first full-sized expansion for the hit deck-building game from Gary Games. The 200-card set features tons of new cards and mechanisms, in addition to a new Event card type. This is a complete game for 1-4 players that's playable on its own or in combination with other Ascension games. Combine this with other Ascension games to play with up to six players!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is a collection of Ascension sets that include the following that are maintained in the Storm of Souls box (no insert): Dawn of Champions Immortal Heroes Realms Unraveled Storm of Souls Played one time; components are really in like new, unplayed condition from a smoke free home. Reason for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;VG_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rating is that I only have the box for Storm of Souls without insert. Buyer to pay priority mail shipping plus paypal fee. I also have separate listings for the Ascension expansions, Dreamscape and X; War of Shadows. Both are in their separate boxes but Dreamscape does not have the insert. Like new, unplayed from smoke free home. Each of these expansions is $20. Buyer to pay priority mail shipping and pay pal fee.
